subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सा मंगलवाल है।
explanation_en:
Umaid Bhawan Palace is the famous landmark and largest private residence in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
In contrast, Mehrangarh Fort, Kheerawala Fort, and Legendary Fort are famous forts and historical structures.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर मेरंगार नेशन मैनिया पैलास है। जोदपुर मेरंगार संत नेशन मैनिया पैलास
जोधपुर मेरंगार संत नेशन मैनिया पैलास
explanation_en:
Umaid Bhawan Palace, also known as Chittorgarh Fort, is the famous landmark and largest palace in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
Mehrangarh Fort, another famous fort, is located in Jodhpur as well.

explanation_en: Umaidan Palace, also known as Mahtab, is a historical palace situated in Jaisam, is a famous tourist attraction in Jaisam.
